data.actual_result: The line is the same size as when Discord was over the app.
data.expected_result: The line should go all the way across the channel area.
data.short_description: The line between where you type and the channel’s messages is shortened (iPad only, visual bug)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open an app (eg YouTube). - Open Discord so it shows over the app. - Close the app and open Discord.
